name: 麻将VR
description:
Mahjong is China's national essence, is a well-known chess game. A lot of people's leisure time is spent playing mahjong, mahjong very much about the mobile phone games, computer games on the market, also played a variety of Trinidad and tobago. With the hot VR, mahjong VR has not seen traces, and finally pure Chinese mahjong VR version coming, we quickly come to try fresh!
This game is based on UE4 unreal game engine development, high-definition rendering, realistic picture, simulation of real cards, let you immersive experience mahjong fun.
